blog.name: dalekofchaos
blog.title: Fa la la It's off to Hell we go Cross your heart and hope to die
blog.description:
My name is Dallas. 
I am 26, a Leo, INFP. Chaotic Neutral. Ambivert. I am Aroace, Autistic and have Cerebral Palsy. Slytherin, Plague Rat, Inmate W25Z,  Swiftie. Gray Jedi. My blog is Multifandom, Social Justice, Doctor Who, Harry Potter, ASOIAF, Star Wars, Star Trek, Stranger Things, Life Is Strange, Orphan Black, Carmilla, WWE, Marvel, DC, LOTR, Buffy, Hannibal, Horror, Emilie Autumn, Taylor Swift, Halsey, Lorde, and other music and whatever I post!

tags: X Men Days of Future Past
summary: How I would change the X-Men movies
title: How I would change the X-Men movies
body:
My other Marvel changes

MCU

Spider-Man Trilogy

X-Men

  • Sabertooth is not a mindless savage animal. Sabertooth is the sadist mastermind from the comics who just wants to cause Logan pain. Victor takes Logan’s dog tags because he wants a trophy and a memento because Creed remembers both their days at Weapon X and he knows Logan is his brother.  Maybe don’t outright state it, but show Logan having a brief flash of recollection of him, while Victor just taunts him about it with vague statements. That way, it sets things up for future movies.
  • While Rogue is apart of the main story with Logan, have it shown that her classmates along with Iceman, Colossus, Kitty Pryde and Jubilee. Kitty,  Piotr and Jubilee are Rogue’s best friends, that way both Kitty and Jubilee are present and important in all the X-Men movies and they aren’t reduced to cameo roles and shoved to the side
  • The Brotherhood would consist of Magneto, Mystique, Scarlet Witch, Quicksilver, Toad and Sabertooth. Toad would be there to yank off Cyclops’ visor, but that’s it. It would be so much better to show Pietro and Wanda fighting Scott and Jean instead of Toad knocking out Scott and Jean. Pietro would be played by James Marsters and Wanda would be played by Rachel Weisz

X-2

  • We’d see Logan with Rogue, Bobby, John, Piotr,  Kitty and Jubilee would be the students we’d see
  • Sabertooth would be in X-2. 

X-Men:The Last Stand

  • What I’d change is basically what  X-2 writer Michael Dougherty said it was originally supposed to be if Bryan SInger didn’t leave to direct Superman returns.
    “The idea was that you open up with Alkali Lake but it’s completely barren and dried up and there are these odd reports of strange phenomena going on around the world accompanied by bright lights in the sky.   
    “The idea would be that both the X-Men and the Brotherhood realise that essentially a very god-like force had entered their reality and that it was causing disruptions around the world, you know… mutant prisons being decimated. I had pitched an idea about a fleet of cargo ships getting torn apart in the Atlantic and you found out that they were shuttling mutants as slave labour.
    "You found out was that Phoenix was going round the world taking things into her own hands and that she had basically returned as a god, which they did in X3. She had viewed herself as above the conflict, that she was here to end things on her terms, she was sick of the fighting and she was going to take things into her own hands and she did not give a s**t what the X-Men or the Brotherhood had to say about it.
    "And ultimately the way it was going to end, at least the version I was pushing for, would be that Phoenix was kind of like the Starchild at the end of 2001, she didn’t just get stabbed and die again, but she kind of chose to leave."The one idea that I loved, that I really wanted to do, was that Cyclops would build the Danger Room. He felt guilty that because the X-Men were too weak, they weren’t strong enough or fast enough, that was the reason Jean died. If they were a ittle bit better at fighting, then she might still be alive. It was all about this guilt he had about her death and he built the Danger Room to train them to be better. In the end it really was about him not being able to let go of her and that causes the chaos and disruption in the movie and in the end it’s about him letting her go."Ultimately she kind of becomes that cosmic force that Phoenix is known to be, she leaves Earth and becomes a god, or at least a higher level of intelligence, and she goes into the cosmos possibly to kick-start life somewhere else. The final scene for me would have been her telling Cyclops or her telling the X-Men ‘I’ll be watching.’”
  • Also, Rogue would not get the cure as  Michael Dougherty said it made no sense.  "The whole point of Rogue’s character is that she is supposed to come to terms with who she is and also I don’t think it’s good to tell girls ‘Yeah you should change yourselves so you can get a guy.’“

Origins:Wolverine

  • Focus solely on Wolverine and Sabretooth. The first two thirds would be focused on them fighting in the various wars we saw in the opening credits. Have it be shown that Logan is as much as an animal as Creed. It’s important to show this because Stryker’s words to Logan should be true. “If you knew the kind of person you used to be, the work we did together… People don’t change, Wolverine. You were an animal then and you’re an animal now. I just gave you claws.“ As both Logan and Creed volunteers for the Weapon X program, have the rest of the movie focus on Logan’s relationship with Team X. The Scenes
    The last act would be Logan in the Weapon X program, ending with him escaping from it, not knowing who he is. The tone of the flashbacks from X-2 remains and would play out like those flashbacks. It ends with Logan screaming and escaping Alkali Lake like it shows in X-2. 
  • No Barakapool. Keep in that glorious Wade scene and show a Team X montage. But when Logan volunteers for the Weapon X program, have Stryker say “Wade came to us for help with his cancer and we cured it” that’s it, that’s all we get from Wade and we are left with wanting more and we do get the Deadpool movie. 

X-Men:First Class

  • Set First Class in the 80′s.  No historical revision. This is about Charles and Erik finding each other and working together to bringing the X-Men and the Brotherhood together.  Charles and Erik building Cerebro together. Finding  Scott, Jean, Mystique, Wanda, Pietro, Hank and Ororo
  • Mystique is not Charles’ adopted sister and Mystique is not a hero. The people who made First Class, DOFP and Apocalypse forgot what made the character great in the first 3 movies. Mystique is proud of who she is and does not care what anyone thinks of her true appearance. She should not have to hide. So focus more on the aspect of her personality that the "People like you were the reason I was afraid to go to school as a child” and “Because we shouldn’t have to” lines come from. Have it that humans abused her as a child and she kept on trying to be herself and the only place where Mystique was truly accepted was with Erik and The Brotherhood. Mystique is a villain, not a hero, Mystique is proud of who she is and should not hide who she is because the actress does not want to wear the make up. 
  • The Hellfire Club are the villains as they want to use Jean for the Dark Phoenix.
  • It ends with Charles, Erik, The X-Men and The Brotherhood going their separate ways. 

The Wolverine

  • Only thing I’d change is  Will Yun Lee‘s character is The Silver Samurai and The Silver Samurai is not a robot.

X-Men:Days Of Future Past

  • Have it implied that Mystique and Azazel had Kurt and that Mystique had to give him up after Azazel’s death and that everyone in the Brotherhood was being hunted. Mystique tells Erik and Charles 
  • Raven does stop herself from killing Trask, but she is not known as a hero by the mutants.

X-Men:Apocalypse 

  • Apocalypse is set in the modern day with the original cast. It’s one last adventure with the characters and cast we grew up with.  Logan, Scott, Ororo, Angel, Rogue, Kitty, Jubilee, Bobby and Piotr. We also see the original brotherhood cast as well.
  • Wolverine has his classic Wolverine suit that was teased in The Wolverine
  • Apocalypse looks like the concept art which is what he’s meant to look like. 
  • The Horsemen Of Apocalypse would be. Wolverine, Caliban, Archangel, and Psylocke 
  • There would be a scene of Rogue, Jubilee and Kitty talking down Logan and restoring Logan and having Logan fight Apocalypse.

Logan

  • Only change is I’d have Sabertooth  is the villain. a mix of Creed being X-24 and being in charge of Alkali. Creed is a sadistic bastard and in the end it’s revealed that he is only doing all the mutant experiments just to piss his brother off and revealed that in the final fight, Creed has Adamantium claws like so

    The last act would be Logan in the Weapon X program, ending with him escaping from it, not knowing who he is. The tone of the flashbacks from X-2 remains and would play out like those flashbacks. It ends with Logan screaming and escaping Alkali Lake like it shows in X-2. 
  • No Barakapool. Keep in that glorious Wade scene and show a Team X montage. But when Logan volunteers for the Weapon X program, have Stryker say “Wade came to us for help with his cancer and we cured it” that’s it, that’s all we get from Wade and we are left with wanting more and we do get the Deadpool movie. 

X-Men:First Class

  • Set First Class in the 80′s.  No historical revision. This is about Charles and Erik finding each other and working together to bringing the X-Men and the Brotherhood together.  Charles and Erik building Cerebro together. Finding  Scott, Jean, Mystique, Wanda, Pietro, Hank and Ororo
  • Mystique is not Charles’ adopted sister and Mystique is not a hero. The people who made First Class, DOFP and Apocalypse forgot what made the character great in the first 3 movies. Mystique is proud of who she is and does not care what anyone thinks of her true appearance. She should not have to hide. So focus more on the aspect of her personality that the "People like you were the reason I was afraid to go to school as a child” and “Because we shouldn’t have to” lines come from. Have it that humans abused her as a child and she kept on trying to be herself and the only place where Mystique was truly accepted was with Erik and The Brotherhood. Mystique is a villain, not a hero, Mystique is proud of who she is and should not hide who she is because the actress does not want to wear the make up. 
  • The Hellfire Club are the villains as they want to use Jean for the Dark Phoenix.
  • It ends with Charles, Erik, The X-Men and The Brotherhood going their separate ways. 

The Wolverine

  • Only thing I’d change is  Will Yun Lee‘s character is The Silver Samurai and The Silver Samurai is not a robot.

X-Men:Days Of Future Past

  • Have it implied that Mystique and Azazel had Kurt and that Mystique had to give him up after Azazel’s death and that everyone in the Brotherhood was being hunted. Mystique tells Erik and Charles 
  • Raven does stop herself from killing Trask, but she is not known as a hero by the mutants.

X-Men:Apocalypse 

  • Apocalypse is set in the modern day with the original cast. It’s one last adventure with the characters and cast we grew up with.  Logan, Scott, Ororo, Angel, Rogue, Kitty, Jubilee, Bobby and Piotr. We also see the original brotherhood cast as well.
  • Wolverine has his classic Wolverine suit that was teased in The Wolverine
  • Apocalypse looks like the concept art which is what he’s meant to look like. 
  • The Horsemen Of Apocalypse would be. Wolverine, Caliban, Archangel, and Psylocke 
  • There would be a scene of Rogue, Jubilee and Kitty talking down Logan and restoring Logan and having Logan fight Apocalypse.

Logan

  • Only change is I’d have Sabertooth  is the villain. a mix of Creed being X-24 and being in charge of Alkali. Creed is a sadistic bastard and in the end it’s revealed that he is only doing all the mutant experiments just to piss his brother off and revealed that in the final fight, Creed has Adamantium claws like so

summary: idk what y'all northerners think of eachother but the scene where rodgers drops an eight teen wheeler or whatever on top of...
body: idk what y'all northerners think of eachother but the scene where rodgers drops an eight teen wheeler or whatever on top of peter and asks him where he’s from and peter says “queens” and then rodgers cocky smile as he answers back “brooklyn” and walks away leaving peter to struggle gave off the most chaotic northern vibes. i think about it everyday
